{"id":453788864,"lang":"java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1612826027,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/453788864/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"38.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if (n == 1) return x;\n        if (n == -1) return 1 / x;\n        if (n == 0) return 1;\n        \n        int mid = n / 2;\n        double powMid = myPow(x, mid);\n        powMid *= powMid;\n        if (2 * mid == n) {\n            // n is even\n            return powMid;\n        } else {\n            return powMid * myPow(x, n - 2 * mid);\n        }\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
